#summary Node.JS

= Installation =

{{{
# need python 2.6
cp /usr/bin/python26 /usr/bin/python
wget http://nodejs.org/dist/v0.5.6/node-v0.5.6.tar.gz
tar zxvf node-v0.5.6.tar.gz
cd node-v0.5.6
./configure
make
make install
}}}
